lead_paragraph: GEBINER--Aliza, on March 23, 2016. Staunch education advocate and teacher and dedicated City official. Survived by her sister Rivka, nephews Marc and Andy, niece Wendy, grandnephew Rocky, grandnieces Ally and Carly. In lieu of flowers, contributions in Aliza's memory may be made to The Metropolitan Opera. Services today 4:30pm at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
